languages.text: Each of the wearer's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} made with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} increases their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} by +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} until the end of combat.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程武器{/g}造成暴击时，其{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}都会提高，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Each of the wearer's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} made with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} increases their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} by +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器造成暴击时{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}，其近战武器的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击伤害{/g}都会提高，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>，效果持续至战斗结束。

每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}武器造成暴击时，其{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}都会提高，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Каждое {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, которое персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционным{/g} оружием, увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критический урон{/g}, который он наносит {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием, на {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Each of the wearer's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} made with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} increases their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} by +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Каждое {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g}, которое персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционным{/g} оружием, увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критический урон{/g}, который он наносит рукопашным оружием, на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g}</u> до конца боя.

Каждое {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g}, которое персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционным{/g} оружием, увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критический урон{/g}, который он наносит рукопашным оружием, на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g}</u> до конца боя.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠距離武器{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を与えるたびに、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}分増加する。
languages.original_text: Each of the wearer's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} made with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} increases their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} by +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Range}レンジ{/g}ウェポンでクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}を与えるたびに、戦闘終了時まで近接武器の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分増加する。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}武器でクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}を与えるたびに、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分増加する。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador realice un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico con un {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}arma a distancia{/g}, aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} con armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Each of the wearer's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} made with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} increases their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} by +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador realice un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico con un arma a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g}, aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}daño crítico{/g} con armas cuerpo a cuerpo +</u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g}<u> hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Jeder mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfwaffe{/g} erzielte kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} des Trägers erhöht seinen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g} für {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Jeder mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}waffe erzielte kritische {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} des Trägers erhöht seinen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Schaden{/g} für Nahkampfwaffen bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u>.
